name: Dice-Alien
description:
Dice-Alien is a puzzle game with interesting alien movement.
Stranded as an alien in a dice world, you make it your mission to find out more about this world with your 6 appendages.

(This game was created in the gmtk2022 jam https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022)

ignore the weird abrupt ending, didnt have time left to add an ending.
